sentences.cn: 会计是一种需要坐着工作的职业.

sentences.en: Corporate crime — committed by businesses — should not be confused with white - collar crime, which refers to the occupation of the perpetrator and may be directed against a business.
sentences.cn: 公司犯罪不应与 白领 犯罪混淆, 后者指的是犯罪者的职业,其罪行可能是针对企业的.

sentences.en: He has engaged in rather shady occupation.
sentences.cn: 他从事相当不明不白的职业.

sentences.en: He is a factory director by occupation.
He is a teacher by occupation but a philosopher by inclination.
sentences.cn: 他的职业是教师,但他的本心是成为哲学家.

sentences.en: He wanted to look for occupation suited to his abilities.
sentences.cn: 他想找个适合自己才能的职业

sentences.en: I haven't entered up your name and occupation yet.
sentences.cn: 我尚未记下你的名字和职业.

sentences.en: Intellectual life in France was smothered by the occupation.
sentences.cn: 在被占领期间法国思想界受到了压制。

sentences.en: Large parts of Britain were under Roman occupation.
sentences.cn: 不列颠的大部分领土曾被罗马人占领.

sentences.en: Please state your name, address and occupation.
sentences.cn: 请写明你的姓名、地址和职业。

sentences.en: Please state your name, age and occupation below.
sentences.cn: 请在下面写明姓名、年龄和职业。

sentences.en: Prii had become fluent in German during the Wehrmacht's occupation of Estonia in 1942.
sentences.cn: 在1942年德军侵占爱沙尼亚期间，普里学得了一口流利的德语。

sentences.en: Reading is a useful occupation to us.
sentences.cn: 阅读对我们是一种有益的消遣.

sentences.en: She was born in France during German occupation.
sentences.cn: 她在德国占领期间生于法国.

sentences.en: The old man became bored for lack of occupation.
sentences.cn: 这位老人因无所事事而感到无聊.

sentences.en: You will be asked to fill in a form with details of your birth and occupation.
sentences.cn: 你将需要填写一张有关生日和职业详情的表格。

words.tran_cn: 已占用的；使用中的；无空闲的

trans.tran_cn: 职业，工作，占有，占领，（土地、房屋、建筑等的）使用
